definition: representing a human being as a physical thing deprived of personal qualities or individuality
details:
noun
- representing a human being as a physical thing deprived of personal qualities or individuality
= synonyms: depersonalisation
- (existentialism) a loss of personal identity
= synonyms: depersonalisation
- emotional dissociative disorder in which there is loss of contact with your own personal reality accompanied by feelings of unreality and strangeness
= synonyms: depersonalisation, depersonalization disorder, depersonalisation disorder, depersonalization neurosis, depersonalisation neurosis
